name: MatchMe
description:
Hello Everyone !

 This is a small Game's prototype done in 2 days. You can play around with it .

  • Drag/Drop the cubes 👆
  • Put the cube with the right weight on the right Grid Unit
  • you can Combine/Fusion the cubes 
  • Use the Big Icon to rotate the Grid ♻
  • you have just 3 levels :)

Keep in mind maybe you will have some bugs , its a proto afterAll :)

Thanks and enjoy
